name: Soul of the forest (Kantor3D)
description:
This is a boss fight game in which you are sent to face the most ruthless champion the arena has to offer, but a special amulet in your possession may hold the key to the victory. 

The forest that was destroyed in favour of building the arena now only remains in a higher plane of existence, and yet it still corresponds with the arena built upon it. Use it to your advantage!
